name: Simon Belmont
description: Most famous of the Belmonts, Simon is a man of few words and even less tolerance of the night.  Not only did he take down Dracula one-on-one, but also trekked across Wallachia to gather his scattered remains, bringing him back to life. Why? So he could beat Dracula AGAIN...and eliminate much of the vampire's curse at the same time.
